title: Brave & Bold - Watchface
summary: Brave & Bold - Watchface perfectly blends into your Watchface Collection!
description: Brave & Bold – Watchface is elegantly designed to perfectly blend into your Watchface Wardrobe and adds that magical & trendy touch to your overall Android Wear experience.*Highly Visible & Elegant Feel.*Old School imposing Digital Flip Clock.*For Round & Square watches*Classy Ambient mode design. *Stands out with its Slick, Funky & Cool looks.*Whether you are Young or not so young :p *At your work desk or an evening café hang out with friends.*Getting an early morning coffee or sneaking out for lunch.*Feeling either sporty or weirdly geeky.Brave & Bold – Watchface is a must have in your wardrobe.Supported DevicesBrave & Bold - Watchface has been tested live on Moto360 and LG G Watch.It also supports LG G WATCH R, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3, Samsung Gear LIVE.Feedback & Support We try very hard not to disappoint our customers and we depend upon your support & valuable feedback to keep coming up with Quality products for the SmartWatch eco-system.Please don’t rate us 1-Star. If you see any bugs / errors that let you down, please email us your issues @ support.android@devwizards.co and we’ll try our best to resolve those in a timely manner.Installation & Other common synchronization problemsIf Brave & Bold - Watchface does not appear on your Android Wear App or the Watch itself, don’t worry and try out the below instructions: a)	Wait for few minutes and it should come up in Android Wear app or the watch.b)	If it doesn’t show up, disconnect your watch from your phone and reconnect.c)	If it still doesn’t work, hold down your watchface in your watch and see if it’s showing up there.d)	Restart your watch.e)	Uninstall Brave & Bold - Watchface and reinstall it again.f)	Lastly reset your watch and then try all of the above again.
descriptionHTML:
Brave & Bold – Watchface is elegantly designed to perfectly blend into your Watchface Wardrobe and adds that magical & trendy touch to your overall Android Wear experience.


*Highly Visible & Elegant Feel.

*Old School imposing Digital Flip Clock.


*For Round & Square watches

*Classy Ambient mode design.

*Stands out with its Slick, Funky & Cool looks.

*Whether you are Young or not so young :p

*At your work desk or an evening café hang out with friends.

*Getting an early morning coffee or sneaking out for lunch.

*Feeling either sporty or weirdly geeky.


Brave & Bold – Watchface is a must have in your wardrobe.

Supported Devices

Brave & Bold - Watchface has been tested live on Moto360 and LG G Watch.

It also supports LG G WATCH R, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3, Samsung Gear LIVE.

Feedback & Support

We try very hard not to disappoint our customers and we depend upon your support & valuable feedback to keep coming up with Quality products for the SmartWatch eco-system.

Please don’t rate us 1-Star. If you see any bugs / errors that let you down, please email us your issues @ support.android@devwizards.co and we’ll try our best to resolve those in a timely manner.

Installation & Other common synchronization problems

If Brave & Bold - Watchface does not appear on your Android Wear App or the Watch itself, don’t worry and try out the below instructions:

a) Wait for few minutes and it should come up in Android Wear app or the watch.
b) If it doesn’t show up, disconnect your watch from your phone and reconnect.
c) If it still doesn’t work, hold down your watchface in your watch and see if it’s showing up there.
d) Restart your watch.
e) Uninstall Brave & Bold - Watchface and reinstall it again.
f) Lastly reset your watch and then try all of the above again.
comments: Very funny watchface for FREE Lovely watchface with wearing glasses.  Would you make the eyes rotation for reflecting Second value (like second hand location in analog clock).  Or may be the eyes will move when you shake your watch.  Ha ha.  Anyway, your work is really great and thanks a lot.
Outstanding watchface. The developer has obviously put in alot of mind into it. Looking for additional customisation features though :)
